statements: SELECT * FROM influencer_campaigns;
SELECT brand_name, influencer_name, roi FROM influencer_campaigns ORDER BY roi DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, brand_name, influencer_name FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate >= 5;
SELECT * FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE brand_name LIKE '%company%';
SELECT influencer_name, roi FROM influencer_campaigns ORDER BY influencer_name ASC, roi DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, brand_name FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE roi > 1000;
SELECT brand_name, influencer_name, roi FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate < 3.5 ORDER BY roi DESC;
SELECT brand_name, influencer_name FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE brand_name LIKE 'A%' AND influencer_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) AS average_conversion_rate FROM influencer_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM BrandConversionRates;
SELECT brand_id, ROI FROM BrandConversionRates WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT influencer_id, campaign_date FROM BrandConversionRates ORDER BY campaign_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(conversion_rate) as total_conversions, AVG(ROI) as average_roi FROM BrandConversionRates;
SELECT influencer_id, engagement_rate FROM InfluencerCampaignStats WHERE impressions > 1000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM BrandConversionRates WHERE ROI > 1.5 ORDER BY brand_id DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT brand_id, influencer_id, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM BrandConversionRates GROUP BY brand_id, influencer_id HAVING AVG(conversion_rate) > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT brand_id, COUNT(influencer_id) AS num_influencers, SUM(ROI) AS total_ROI FROM BrandConversionRates GROUP BY brand_id HAVING total_ROI > 1000 ORDER BY num_influencers DESC;

SELECT influencer_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, AVG(impressions) AS avg_impressions FROM InfluencerCampaignStats WHERE campaign_id = 1 GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING total_revenue > 500 ORDER BY avg_impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM BrandConversionRates b JOIN InfluencerCampaignStats i ON b.brand_id = i.influencer_id WHERE b.conversion_rate > 0.8 AND i.revenue > 1000 ORDER BY b.brand_id, i.impressions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Influencers
SELECT id, name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 100000
SELECT name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT id, name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 5000
SELECT name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC
SELECT id, name, followers, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers < 2000
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Brand
SELECT brand_name FROM Brand ORDER BY brand_id DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM Campaign WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT influencer_name FROM Influencer WHERE influencer_id = 2
SELECT conversion_id, conversion_date, conversion_rate FROM Conversion WHERE campaign_id = 5 ORDER BY conversion_date
SELECT * FROM Brand WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_id FROM Influencer WHERE influencer_id = 2;
SELECT brand_name, brand_id FROM Brand ORDER BY brand_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaign WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT influencer_name, conversion_date FROM Influencer JOIN Conversion ON Influencer.influencer_id = Conversion.influencer_id WHERE Conversion.conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM brands;
SELECT name, industry FROM brands WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT id, name, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT name, revenue FROM conversions JOIN campaigns ON conversions.campaign_id = campaigns.id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, name, industry FROM brands WHERE industry = 'Fashion';
SELECT influencers.name, influencers.followers, campaigns.budget FROM influencers JOIN campaigns ON influencers.id = campaigns.influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT brands.name AS brand_name, influencers.name AS influencer_name, campaigns.budget FROM brands JOIN campaigns ON brands.id = campaigns.brand_id JOIN influencers ON campaigns.influencer_id = influencers.id;

SELECT campaigns.id, conversions.conversion_date, conversions.revenue FROM campaigns INNER JOIN conversions ON campaigns.id = conversions.campaign_id WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY conversions.revenue DESC;
